name: Nanjing
title: Nanjing - Traveling China like your home yard
overview: Nanjing, the capital of Jiangsu Province, served as the capital of several Chinese dynasties and is known for its rich history and cultural significance. Famous for the Purple Mountain scenic area, the Presidential Palace, and the Memorial Hall of the Nanjing Massacre, Nanjing offers a deep dive into Chinese history and culture.

highlights.attractions: Purple Mountain, Sun Yat-sen Mausoleum, Presidential Palace, Confucius Temple
highlights.cuisine: Nanjing Salted Duck, Duck Blood Soup, Steamed Dumplings, Osmanthus Duck
highlights.bestTime: Spring (March-May) and Autumn (September-November) with mild weather
